constants.name: UsePlainText
constants.description: Plaintext is not used, and instead binary encoding is used in log files

constants.name: MaxSize
constants.description: 512 KiB for the size of a log file

constants.name: MaxRotateCount
constants.description: 1 rotated file present (2 total, including the currently active log file)

constants.name: IgnoreAccents
constants.description: Accents and ligatures are not ignored when indexing via full text search

constants.name: Continuous
constants.description: One-shot replication is used, and will stop once all initial changes are processed

constants.name: AllowReplicatingInBackground
constants.description: Replication stops when an application enters background mode

constants.name: Heartbeat
constants.description: A heartbeat messages is sent every 300 seconds to keep the connection alive

constants.name: MaxAttemptsSingleShot
constants.description: When replicator is not continuous, after 9 failed attempts give up on the replication

constants.name: MaxAttemptsContinuous
constants.description: When replicator is continuous, never give up unless explicitly stopped

constants.name: MaxAttemptWaitTime
constants.description: One-shot replication is used, and will stop once all initial changes are processed

constants.name: EnableAutoPurge
constants.description: Purge documents when a user loses access

constants.name: Port
constants.description: No port specified, the OS will assign one

constants.name: DisableTls
constants.description: TLS is enabled on the connection

constants.name: ReadOnly
constants.description: The listener will allow database writes

constants.name: EnableDeltaSync
constants.description: Delta sync is disabled for the listener
